sentence: We went upstairs to see our room and we were greeted by a staff member already dropping off our luggage
After getting back to the room I informed the front desk of the tv and mini bar issues
Showers have a rainfall option and a hand held option
We stayed at a room with an ocean view and we could not have been happier with the size and the cleanliness of the room
however what they failed to mention was that the hotel was fully booked because some power company bought out all the rooms for a corporate retreat fine they are entitled to do this
The thing that really bothered me was there was no hot water at all in the shower
Most days we had to call for the room to be cleaned and very rarely did the whole suite get cleaned
The mini bars had stuff in them we would use like water sodas juice chips snack bars and candy and the refilled them everyday
Understandably so we were very upset so they promised to move our rooms and UPGRADE both rooms
However the alternate room was not an ocean view which is what we paid for
I was happy with my upgraded room because it was basically an apartment
We stayed in an ocean view family concierge with 2 full beds
If we vacation in Mexico again we will return to the Barcelo Maya Palace Deluxe where we visited last year
The room they gave us was right outside a small breakfast area and adjoined to the storage compartment woken up every morning at 4 am
The view is great on both sides towards the sea or the lagoon
Rooms part 1 When we checked in I asked for a quiet room with a king sized bed
And it smelled like backed up sewage in the first floor of my tower and bathroom
Room shapes can be bizarre but attribute it to the unique and impressive architecture of the hotel
room with ocean view has a bathtub and nice view but again decoration is old fashioned

Although we never came across the chambermaids our room was always very well cleaned and nightly turned down service was always done
Unlimited use of spa facilities sauna steam room were included with the package we booked so no complaints here

Rooms need to be updated but the staff food and entertainment are excellent
they offered a room so we could rest until our suite was ready
Ocean view less than 200 from the beach
A minibar full of drinks included in the package
RomOur room had two double beds a sofa bed a separate room with a sofa bed and a chaise as well as two full baths

Similar business model and both times I upgraded to the best service package for families and a suitethis time a gorgeous one bedroom with 2 private patios

Room was specious and lovely view from the balcony many restaurants to choose from for breakfast lunch dinner
Incredible views and the very finest most pristine beach on the entire blvd
Paradisus suites indoor nature displays and ambience all live up to it is name
